title: SC to examine Madras HC ruling that downloading, watching child porn not offence under POCSO, IT laws
comments:
>Terming as “atrocious”, the Supreme Court on March 11 agreed to hear a plea challenging a Madras High Court ruling which said that mere downloading and watching child pornography is not an offence under the POCSO Act and the Information Technology law.

>The High Court had, on January 11, quashed the criminal proceedings against a 28-year-old man charged with downloading on his mobile phone pornographic content involving children.

>The present-day children are grappling with the serious issue of watching porn and instead of punishing them, the society must be "mature enough" to educate them, it had also said.

>“This (the high court judgement) is atrocious. How can the single judge say this? Issue notice returnable in three weeks,” the CJI said.
Meanwhile someone just check that HC judge’s browser history.

High court gave out the correct judgement imo, CJI being a dick like always, first you don't educate people what's wrong and what's not, on top of that the one who uploaded the CP should be tracked down first
Someone check this guy's browser history.

What. I didn't mean to say that the person watching CP is right, I just pointed out how stupid the system in our country is, no sex education is the reason people can't tell right from wrong. Again, not saying what the guy did is justifiable but the govt is also to be blamed
